NAME: Whirlwind
DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Energy for every 2 damage dealt for the rest of this turn. Discard this card at the end of your turn.

NAME: Stab
DESCRIPTION: Deal 2 damage for each Attack played this turn, ignoring Barrier on the target.

NAME: Dodge
DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 Attack card pending on you. Draw 1 card.

NAME: Counter
DESCRIPTION: Use a Boss Attack card drawn this turn on the Boss.

NAME: Pocket Sand
DESCRIPTION: Discard the next Boss Status applied to you, then discard this card.
